title: Rioter please answer this question!   About Ranked Rewards and A notification I got.
body:
I was in lol at 9:05 ontario Toronto time on 10/26/2016 and i got notification that ill be bronze 3 starting next season and like last season that demotes you 1 whole rank, (s2-b2, g5-s5) but I am pretty sure i'll rank up in the next 12 days, by the time season ends and I am trying to get gold.  If I do I will still get rewards right and I can change what rank I will get next season,

(kinda forgot but) Your next seasons rank will be bronze 3, keep in mind almost all players are demoted a rank. 

So will I get rewards and border or is it already decided?

replies.body:
The [Ranked Rewards](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2016-ranked-season-ends-soon) you receive this year will be determined by which *Ranked Tier* you **end the season at**. 

Keep on pushing upwards to Gold, friend. Let me know if you have any other questions. ^.^
